PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married man from a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a white non-hispanic protestant with some college education but no degree. robert was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen.

although he seldom attends religious services, robert identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian. his political affiliation is with the republican party, and he holds conservative ideological views. robert comes from a middle-income family, earning between $50,000 and $60,000 annually.

an avid internet user, robert spends several times a day online. however, he does not engage in any voluntary work. robert is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration status at his current address.

overall, robert is a retired, married, white, conservative, protestant man living a comfortable life in a metropolitan area of the midwest, staying up-to-date with current events and actively participating in the political process.
